Class CanvasDrawer

    Updateable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CanvasDrawer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Updateable
    A Class that is responsible for drawing everything on the screen

      • paintComponent

        protected void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
        Method that calls all components paint themselves on the screen. This methods also includes a Switch case structure to switch between different gamestates, so that only the current gamestate is drawn on the screen.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
